recipe.title: Sangrita Bloody Mary
ingredients: 2 cans tomato juice, each 1 quart 14 ounces (about 12 cups total),chilled
2 2/3 cups fresh orange juice (from about 8 oranges)
2 cups aquavit such as Aalborg or Linie if desired
instructions: In a large pitcher stir together all ingredients except aquavit. Juice mixture may be made 3 hours ahead and chilled, covered.
Stir in aquavit and serve in glasses filled with ice. Garnish drinks with celery.
